resources.string: You have used %1$s to complete the game.

How to Play?
 1. Enter your name and press "Start"
 2. Enter a URL and press "Fetch"
 3. Wait for 20 images to be downloaded
 4. Select 6 images for the game
 5. Click on any 2 cards to see if they match
 6. Continue until all cards are matched
 7. The timer will stops when all the cards are matched
 8. View your current and best timing
